name: Ragnarok, Baby!
description:
Ragnarok is coming!  After spending some time in Valhalla, it's been decided you the world's greatest warriors.  As such, you are given the task of taking care of one of the two babies destined to survive the apocalypse.  Unfortunately, the gods who are destined to die during this time blame the innocent one on its coming.  They have sent their minions and laid traps in an attempt to stop you.  You must protect the baby!

Created at Toronto Game Jam 9!

Party like it's 19-TOJam-9!

May need to plug in 4 Xbox controllers and find which two work.

CONTROLS: left/right move, X action, A jump
